mmwave_singlecore.c File Reference

The file implements the single core port for the mmWave control module. More...

#include <stdint.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <ti/drivers/osal/DebugP.h>
#include <ti/control/mmwavelink/mmwavelink.h>
#include <ti/control/mmwave/mmwave.h>
#include <ti/control/mmwave/include/mmwave_internal.h>
#include <ti/common/sys_common.h>

Detailed Description

The file implements the single core port for the mmWave control module.

Function Documentation

int32_t MMWave_deviceCfgAsyncEvent ( const MMWave_MCB *  ptrMMWaveMCB,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is used to configure the asynchronous events. On the Single Core the MSS is the default handler for all asynchronous events and this is the default behavior for the BSS. We only need to configure if the start/stop asynchronous events are enabled or disabled.

Parameters
[in]ptrMMWaveMCBPointer to the mmWave control block
[out]errCodeError code populated on error
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
int32_t MMWave_deviceCfgFxn ( const MMWave_MCB *  ptrMMWaveMCB,
MMWave_CtrlCfg *  ptrControlCfg,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is used to handle the configuration for the Single Core. There is only the MSS executing in the system here so we dont need to have any additional handling of the configuration.

Parameters
[in]ptrMMWaveMCBPointer to the mmWave MCB
[in]ptrControlCfgPointer to the mmWave control configuration
[out]errCodeError code populated by the API on an error
Return values
Alwayssuccess
int32_t MMWave_deviceCloseFxn ( const MMWave_MCB *  ptrMMWaveMCB,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is used to close the mmWave control module on Single Core

Parameters
[in]ptrMMWaveMCBPointer to the mmWave MCB
[out]errCodeError code populated by the API on an error
Return values
Alwaysreturns 0
int32_t MMWave_deviceDeinitFxn ( MMWave_MCB *  ptrMMWaveMCB,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is used to deinitialize the mmWave on Single Core

Parameters
[in]ptrMMWaveMCBPointer to the mmWave MCB
[out]errCodeError code populated by the API on an error
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
void MMWave_deviceEventFxn ( const MMWave_MCB *  ptrMMWaveMCB,
uint16_t  msgId,
uint16_t  sbId,
uint16_t  sbLen,
uint8_t *  payload 
)

Description
The function is used to handle the link asynchronous events for the Single Core. There is only the MSS executing in the system here so we dont need to have any additional handling.

Parameters
[in]ptrMMWaveMCBPointer to the mmWave control block
[in]msgIdMessage Identifier
[in]sbIdSubblock identifier
[in]sbLenLength of the subblock
[in]payloadPointer to the payload buffer
Return values
Notapplicable
int32_t MMWave_deviceExecuteFxn ( MMWave_MCB *  ptrMMWaveMCB,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is used to execute the Single Core SOC specific execution for mmWave. There is nothing to be done here.

Parameters
[in]ptrMMWaveMCBPointer to the mmWave MCB
[out]errCodeError code populated by the API on an error
Return values
Success
void MMWave_deviceGetDeviceInfo ( const MMWave_MCB *  ptrMMWaveMCB,
rlUInt8_t *  devType,
rlUInt8_t *  platform 
)

Description
The function is used to get the mmWave link device information. On the Single Core the link always executes only on the MSS.

Parameters
[in]ptrMMWaveMCBPointer to the mmWave control block
[out]devTypeDevice Type populated by the API
[out]platformPlatform populated by the API
Return values
DeviceType as specified by the mmWave Link
int32_t MMWave_deviceInitFxn ( MMWave_MCB *  ptrMMWaveMCB,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is used to initialize mmWave on Single Core.

Parameters
[in]ptrMMWaveMCBPointer to the mmWave MCB
[out]errCodeError code populated by the API on an error
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
int32_t MMWave_deviceOpenFxn ( const MMWave_MCB *  ptrMMWaveMCB,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

The function is used to open the mmWave control module on Single Core.

int32_t MMWave_deviceStartFxn ( const MMWave_MCB *  ptrMMWaveMCB,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is used to handle the link start for the Single Core. There is only the MSS executing in the system here so nothing additional needs to be done here.

Parameters
[in]ptrMMWaveMCBPointer to the mmWave MCB
[out]errCodeError code populated by the API on an error
Return values
Alwayssuccess
int32_t MMWave_deviceStopFxn ( const MMWave_MCB *  ptrMMWaveMCB,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is used to handle the link stop for the Single Core. There is only the MSS executing in the system here so nothing additional needs to be done here.

Parameters
[in]ptrMMWaveMCBPointer to the mmWave MCB
[out]errCodeError code populated by the API on an error
Return values
Alwayssuccess
int32_t MMWave_deviceSyncFxn ( const MMWave_MCB *  ptrMMWaveMCB,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
The function is used to synchronize mmWave on Single Core. Since only the MSS executes on the system the module is always synchronized.

Parameters
[in]ptrMMWaveMCBPointer to the mmWave MCB
[out]errCodeError code populated by the API on an error
Return values
1- Always synchronized
